items: Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart and your knees slightly bent.
Place the barbell on the Smith machine at about hip height.
Step under the bar and position it so that it rests on the back of your shoulders.
Grasp the bar with an overhand grip, slightly wider than shoulder-width apart.
Keeping your back straight and your core engaged, slowly hinge forward at the hips, lowering the bar towards the ground.
Lower the bar as far as you can while maintaining a straight back and without rounding your shoulders.
Pause for a moment at the bottom of the movement, then slowly raise the bar back up to the starting position.
Repeat for the desired number of reps.
